about:
Quizzers' Club NIT Bhopal, the premier quizzing society at Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology (an institute of National Importance acclaimed for its exceptional academic standards and innovative spirit), is committed to elevating the art of quizzing to dazzling heights. By unraveling the complexities of quizzing, the club ignites a passion for this intellectual pursuit among both seasoned enthusiasts and newcomers. Established in February 2013 by a cohort of quizzing prodigies from MANIT, the society has orchestrated over 100 successful quizzes, establishing itself as a cornerstone of intellectual engagement and competitive excellence. The Quizzers' Club is driven by a diverse team of students from various fields, including quizzers, content writers, bloggers, executives, video editors, photographers, and web developers. Together, they collaborate to nurture, cultivate, and launch innovative ideas, fostering lifelong skills and values in the process.
The Quizzer's Club MANIT curates a series of intellectually stimulating events such as Anveshan, Flashback Fiesta, Abhigyan, Manthan, Quizzotica, and Vihaan, alongside a wide array of online quizzing contests. Among these, the Inter-City Quizzing Challenge stands out as a prestigious state-level quiz competition. It brings together school students from Bhopal, Indore, Gwalior, Jabalpur, and Ujjain, creating a thrilling and competitive environment. These events draw significant participation from over 100 schools and colleges across India, including passionate contenders from within MANIT itself. In addition to its quizzing events, the club offers a rich tapestry of captivating questions, intriguing facts, and diverse aptitudes, all meticulously woven into immersive and enlightening content. These elements reinforce the society's mission to deliver a compelling blend of entertainment and education in every facet of its operations. Embark on a journey into the vibrant world of Quizzing, where curiosity meets competition and intellectual adventure awaits at every turn!

address.college: Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology

eventDetails.title: Flashback Fiesta
eventDetails.content:
Feel the essence of nostalgic memories through Flashback Fiesta organised by Quizzers Club NIT Bhopal held during Technosearch which revives every fun memory you had. With over 700+ registrations , this event delighted everyone and tested their adaptability and mindfulness. This event consists of three spellbinding events : Nostalgic Spin, Funky Filp and Vintage Walk. These fascinating games make a way to your childhood. Here the winners meet winners to get the final winner.
These are not just events but an enchanting experience to your soul. Flashback Fiesta is the heart of Technosearch, bridging the past with the present. Come relive those incredible moments with us as we celebrate the victories of cordiality and intellect.

eventDetails.title: Inter-City Quizzing Challenge
eventDetails.desc: Madhya Pradesh's largest school quizzing event
eventDetails.content:
Instilling enthusiasm and zeal into the atmos of QCM, Inter-City Quizzing Challenge delves into testing the brightest of minds. Organized over three dynamic rounds, the event signifies the celebration of knowledge, and the spirit of camaraderie among students. The competition kicks off with the Round 1 which is an online test, followed by shortlisting the top 4 from each school to proceed to the Round 2, city championship. And finally comes the last round, wherein the best from each city come together to showcase their sportsmanship and proficiency
Previously in 2023, with the unwavering support of some of the most highly valued sponsors like NTPC, BPCL, LIC, MP Khadi Gramodhyog, and Unibic, the event opened with 2000+ registrations with over 100 schools from Bhopal, Gwalior, Indore, Jabalpur, and Ujjain, boosting the competition among the young minds. The grand finale was successfully held in Bhopal, garnering a significant number of people, developing a socially interactive environment, and strengthening collaboration among students, volunteers and other delegates. Designed to showcase intellectual prowess and an exuberance towards learning, the invigorating event also promises gripping rewards and recognition. IQC indeed left an indelible mark on the quizzing landscape of Madhya Pradesh, raising up the spirits of competition even higher. Step right up to grab a chance to tune into IQC's symphony of challenges and battles!

eventDetails.title: Anveshan
eventDetails.content:
Anveshan, organized by the Quizzers' Club at NIT Bhopal during Maffick, is an exhilarating treasure hunt that has become a highlight of the festival. Drawing a crowd of 5,000, this event is a true test of intellect, teamwork, and adventure.
The competition begins with a lively first round featuring four engaging games that challenge participants' creativity and problem-solving skills. From these, the top 10 teams emerge to advance to the main event—the treasure hunt. In the second round, these teams embark on a thrilling quest across the campus, deciphering clues and navigating obstacles in a race to find the hidden treasure. The hunt culminates in an intense final showdown, where the winning team is crowned. Anveshan is more than just a competition; it's an adventure that captures the spirit of Maffic, leaving participants and spectators with unforgettable memories.

eventDetails.title: Vihaan
eventDetails.content: Vihaan, an annual quizzing odyssey, captivates the minds of freshers with its ever-evolving thematic brilliance. Each year, this intellectual soiree transforms into a crucible of erudition and exhilaration, fostering a symbiotic blend of learning and merriment. Freshmen immerse themselves in a kaleidoscope of knowledge, navigating through intricate questions and enigmatic challenges. The culmination of their cerebral voyage is adorned with coveted prizes, bestowing honor upon the sagacious victors. Vihaan is not merely a competition; it is a rite of passage, an initiation into a world where curiosity reigns supreme and every participant emerges enriched and enlightened.

eventDetails.title: Manthan
eventDetails.desc: Manthan is the flagship event of the Quizzers' Club at NIT Bhopal, bringing together passionate quizzers from across India for a competitive and enriching quizzing experience.
eventDetails.content:
Manthan is the flagship event of the Quizzers' Club of NIT Bhopal  which stands as a beacon of intellectual challenge and camaraderie, drawing passionate quizzers from every corner of the country. The event is designed to foster a quizzing culture and bring together quizzing enthusiasts.
The competition typically begins with preliminary rounds conducted in colleges across major cities in Madhya Pradesh, ensuring widespread participation. Those who emerge victorious in these early battles advance to the grand finale, where they face off against top teams from cities like Gwalior, Indore, Jabalpur, and Bhopal. The final round is a multi-round quiz that includes themes like national heroes, visual quizzes, buzzer rounds, and rapid-fire questions. The competition culminates with the winners receiving prizes that include cash, branded t-shirts, food vouchers, and other goodies. Manthan not only serves as a competitive platform but also as a learning experience for both participants and the audience. Manthan is an enriching experience for everyone involved, from participants to spectators, fostering learning and forging connections that last far beyond the event itself.

brand.name: M.P. State Electronics Development Corporation Ltd.

qna.question: What is Quizzers Club MANIT?
qna.answer: Quizzers Club MANIT is a student-run organization dedicated to promoting a quizzing culture within MANIT and across country. We organize regular quiz competitions and provide a platform for students to enhance their knowledge across various subjects.

qna.question: What is IQC?
qna.answer:
The Inter-City Quizzing Challenge (IQC) is a prestigious quiz competition designed to bring together some of the brightest young minds from schools across five prominent cities: Bhopal, Jabalpur, Indore, Gwalior, and Ujjain. This event provides a platform for students to showcase their knowledge, critical thinking, and quick decision-making skills while competing against their peers from different cities.
 Structure of the Competition : 
 • Online Qualifiers: The journey begins with an online qualifier round, this round serves as the initial filter to identify the top-performing teams or individuals who will move on to represent their schools in the next stage.  
 • City Qualifiers: The selected team from the online qualifiers advance to the city-level competition. Each city hosts its own qualifying round, where participants engage in head-to-head quiz battles. The goal here is to determine the top team who will earn the honor of representing their city in the grand finale. 
 • Grand Finale: The grand finale brings together the best of the best from each city, pitting them against each other in a highly competitive and intellectually stimulating environment. This final stage is where the ultimate champions are crowned, earning the title of the top quizzers in the entire competition.

qna.question: Who can join Quizzers' Club MANIT?
qna.answer: Students pursuing their graduation from MANIT can join as a official member of QCM.

qna.question: How to join Quizzers' Club NIT-Bhopal?
qna.answer: Every year at the end of the second semester, QCM conducts an annual recruitment drive for freshers. You can fill out the registration form, and if you make it through all of the Assessment Rounds, you will be selected to join the team!

qna.question: Who should I contact if I have more questions?
qna.answer:
For more inquiries, please email quizzersclubmanit@gmail.com or contact the club's officials listed below:
